content.raw:
For clarification to everybody, by `clearing your cache`, Louise meant removing the content inside your current local `/models` directory \(see command below\).

`rm -rfv ~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models`

For the Docker installation, you probably need to go into the Docker container.  I’ll check that.

Once you do that and relaunch the SubT Simulation tool, then it will start downloading all the updated models again.

Be patient though, you will see a blank panel for a few minutes while it’s retrieving all models.
content.html:
For clarification to everybody, by clearing your cache, Louise meant removing the content inside your current local /models directory (see command below).

rm -rfv ~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models

For the Docker installation, you probably need to go into the Docker container. I’ll check that.

Once you do that and relaunch the SubT Simulation tool, then it will start downloading all the updated models again.

Be patient though, you will see a blank panel for a few minutes while it’s retrieving all models.
